DOC.detailed_description: To lessen risk hematoma intravascular injection , several modification , multi-injection perineural technique , become popular . These technique require high degree technical skill multiple needle pass , also carry potential injury . In study , investigator compare ultrasound-guided equivalent transarterial technique ( periarterial injection ) commonly use multi-injection perineural technique .
